title.narrative: Funds being disbursed to grant holders via the fund manager

description.narrative: This activity (Funds being disbursed to grant holders via the fund manager) is a component of UK Aid Match II Fund reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £126,177,775. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Education policy and administrative management, Health policy and administrative management, Disaster prevention and preparedness, Democratic participation and civil society, Small and medium-sized enterprises (SME) development, Environmental policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: MannionDaniels. The start date is 01-09-2016 and the end date is 31-12-2023.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Education - Social Affairs - Education - administration, policy and planning
Environment - Water, Natural Resource Management and Environment - Environment - policy, planning and administration
Health - Social Affairs - Health - policy, planning and administration
Industry - Economic Affairs - Industry - development and services
Other General Services - General Public Service - Other General Services - support to civil society
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - Social Affairs - Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - disaster prevention and preparedness
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2018 Quarter 4

provider-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)
